name: Magic Market 1.0
description:
Hello! We are Iman, Maxime, Pacha and Joseph, and we want to present you with our new project so you and your friends visit extraordinary places in your city or explore a new one in a ludic way with Magic Market! 

For now, the first city that is being developed is Strasbourg, FR.

Stretch your legs and create a magical virtual world with others thanks to augmented reality. 

By exploring, playing and overcoming different challenges throughout the game you will also become part of a social cause! With your and your friends' acquired coins, you will be able to exchange them for dishes for students, clothing for the homeless, or even supporting an animal shelter in real life 🤗
